Posted By: Totema (9/26/2012 9:27:04 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
First strike is redundant with a regeneration cost that cheap. This card could have easily been printed at 4 mana.  
  
He's bad in draft, bad in constructed, and not worth the effort in casual when [Hypnotic Specter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hypnotic Specter) already randomly discards plenty fine. He's the [Bog Hoodlums](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bog Hoodlums) of the set, a meh card design turned into overpriced trash in development. For what purpose, I'm not sure; it wasn't to balance Limited, since the Ringleader is uncommon. Maybe they're trying to compensate for the awesomeness of the guild charms and 1 drop hybrids by printing garbage at uncommon so that people open more packs.
posts.html:
First strike is redundant with a regeneration cost that cheap. This card could have easily been printed at 4 mana.

He's bad in draft, bad in constructed, and not worth the effort in casual when Hypnotic Specter already randomly discards plenty fine. He's the Bog Hoodlums of the set, a meh card design turned into overpriced trash in development. For what purpose, I'm not sure; it wasn't to balance Limited, since the Ringleader is uncommon. Maybe they're trying to compensate for the awesomeness of the guild charms and 1 drop hybrids by printing garbage at uncommon so that people open more packs.

Posted By: bfellow (10/12/2012 1:14:50 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@Feralsymphony So a 4 cost 4/2 first striking regenerater with a spectre ability seems fair? Not at all lol.  
  
If he cost 1 less, he'd be insane. If you're finding yourself lacking in bombs, he's OK in a more controlling deck. It's nearly impossible to destroy him and he rips the little dudes to shreds. With enough [Auger Spree](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Auger Spree)s and [Ultimate Price](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ultimate Price)s, he's ok.   
  
When you splash green into the deck and scavenge some dudes onto him he takes off FAST. He might actually be the premiere Scavenge target.  
  
This card seems a slight underrated. Regenerate for 1 is no joke. If you're against a player who has nothing in the air, this card can straight up win a game with just his blocking ability.
posts.html:
@Feralsymphony So a 4 cost 4/2 first striking regenerater with a spectre ability seems fair? Not at all lol.

If he cost 1 less, he'd be insane. If you're finding yourself lacking in bombs, he's OK in a more controlling deck. It's nearly impossible to destroy him and he rips the little dudes to shreds. With enough Auger Sprees and Ultimate Prices, he's ok.

When you splash green into the deck and scavenge some dudes onto him he takes off FAST. He might actually be the premiere Scavenge target.

This card seems a slight underrated. Regenerate for 1 is no joke. If you're against a player who has nothing in the air, this card can straight up win a game with just his blocking ability.

Posted By: shapelyman (1/26/2013 3:19:47 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I actually really like this card.  
  
I think the main thing you have to keep in mind is what @link3343 said, this guy is made to be paincasted by Rakdos. I think that's pretty neat; as a ringleader, the only person this dude answers to is Rakdos himself, so it makes sense that he shows up punctually when the demon's around.  
  
Otherwise, he requests this exorbitant amount of mana to cover his inconvenience, because frankly, you are aren't Rakdos.  
  
Also, skeletons are way cooler than zombies, and way less overdone. The fact that skeletons are always grinning holds special, Rakdos significance.
posts.html:
I actually really like this card.

I think the main thing you have to keep in mind is what @link3343 said, this guy is made to be paincasted by Rakdos. I think that's pretty neat; as a ringleader, the only person this dude answers to is Rakdos himself, so it makes sense that he shows up punctually when the demon's around.

Otherwise, he requests this exorbitant amount of mana to cover his inconvenience, because frankly, you are aren't Rakdos.

Also, skeletons are way cooler than zombies, and way less overdone. The fact that skeletons are always grinning holds special, Rakdos significance.
